title: Image → Text Converter (OCR)
subtitle: Upload an image (.png, .jpg) to automatically extract text using AI-based OCR. Edit and export the result as a text file.

funFacts.title: OCR Origins
funFacts.description: Optical Character Recognition (OCR) was first developed in the early 20th century to help visually impaired people read printed text.

funFacts.title: Modern AI OCR
funFacts.description: Today’s OCR engines, like Tesseract, use neural networks to recognize handwriting, symbols, and multiple languages.
